entries.title: Final Fantasy maker Square Enix plans ‘aggressive’ NFT investment
entries.description: In a Jan. 1 letter, Square Enix's president outlined the company's vision for the new year, which includes controversial NFT and blockchain technologies.

entries.title: Cloud computing giant Salesforce to cut 10 percent of staff
entries.description: Salesforce announced its plan Wednesday to layoff thousands of workers to reduce costs.

entries.title: The best (and strangest) tech we found at CES 2023
entries.description: CES — one of the world's biggest tech events — is a kaleidoscope of the new and the strange. Here are the most interesting things we found there.

entries.title: Twitter whistleblower Zatko lands at security consulting firm Rapid7
entries.description: The position will be Zatko's first full-time role since being fired by Twitter a year ago after clashing with then-CEO Parag Agrawal over security concerns.
